title: Application of Active Learning Strategies to Strengthen Nursing Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental nursing knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Short-term blended learning program for practicing nurses emphasizing theory-practice integration, combining smartphone-based mobile learning and face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can exercise critical thinking skills with over 80% accuracy during patient assessments through clinical case-based discussions.
Learners can perform infection control protocols with 90% accuracy using simulation-based role-playing.
Learners can improve peer feedback skills by over 70% based on practical case analysis materials shared via mobile platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
